title: Create simple-todo-app complete example
description: Create examples/complete-projects/simple-todo-app/ with original specification, generated environment structure, and explanatory README. This shows a basic project example using Base template.
notes: Subtask of Task 94. Create complete example showing Base template usage for simple web app. Should demonstrate basic task management without domain-specific features.
completion_notes: Created complete example showing Base template usage with: original specification file, generated .claude/ environment structure with commands/context/tasks/reference folders, explanatory README showing template detection and benefits. Example demonstrates automatic content extraction from spec into organized environment files.
